_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeafMC
author: monci@yuemi.org
description: Leaf is a drop-in replacement for Paper servers designed to remove some checks, customized and high-performance, built on top of Gale with optimizations and fixes from other forks.
startup: java -Xms128M $(if [[ "{{DOCKER_RAM}}" == "1" ]]; then if [[ {{DOCKER_RAMX}} -ge 128 && {{DOCKER_RAMX}} -le {{SERVER_MEMORY}} ]]; then echo "-Xmx{{DOCKER_RAMX}}M"; else echo "-Xmx{{SERVER_MEMORY}}M"; fi; fi) $(if [[ "{{JVM_STATUS}}" == "1" ]]; then echo "{{JVM_ARGS}}"; fi) -jar {{SERVER_JARFILE}} --nogui

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Leaf Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

FALLBACK_VERSION="1.21.4"
REPO="Winds-Studio/Leaf"

# Latest Tags
if [ "$MINECRAFT_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    TAG="ver-${FALLBACK_VERSION}"
else
    TAG="ver-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
fi

API_URL="https://api.github.com/repos/${REPO}/releases/tags/${TAG}"
echo "Fetching release info for $TAG..."

DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -s "${API_URL}" | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | test("^leaf-.*\\.jar$")) | .browser_download_url')

# Fallback logic if file not found
if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
    echo "No file found for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}."
    echo "Falling back to version ${FALLBACK_VERSION}..."

    TAG="ver-${FALLBACK_VERSION}"
    API_URL="https://api.github.com/repos/${REPO}/releases/tags/${TAG}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -s "${API_URL}" | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | test("^leaf-.*\\.jar$")) | .browser_download_url')

    if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
        echo "Fallback version also failed. Exiting."
        exit 1
    fi
fi

LEAF_JARFILE="${DOWNLOAD_URL##*/}"

# Backup and download
if [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]; then
    echo "Backing up old server jar..."
    mv "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
fi

echo "Downloading ${LEAF_JARFILE} to ${SERVER_JARFILE}..."
curl -L -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

# Download server.properties if missing
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo "Downloading default server.properties..."
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft to download. 

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Custom Memory
variables.description: Memory Maximum Of Servers In MB

variables.name: Custom Memory Enabled
variables.description: Contact the Server Administrator To Enable This Feature!

variables.name: Custom JVM Arguments
variables.description: Custom Java Runtime Arguments for Minecraft Server Startup | Default value: -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -Dterminal.jline=true -Duser.timezone=Asia/Jakarta -Dterminal.ansi=true

variables.name: Custom JVM Enabled
variables.description: Contact the Server Administrator To Enable This Feature!
